author: TPH

game.author: Mantar
game.name: exile
game.short_description: Challenging, at times brutal, wilderness survival with simple technology.
game.title: Exile

long_description:
Adds music to your Exile playthrough that plays quietly in the background

https://content.luanti.org/packages/Mantar/exile/

Feel free to add your own music into the sounds folder! It'll play them in the background too! Perfectly-so!

Utilizes io.open(path, "rb") to read the sound files and get their duration - only ran on world/server start

Debating making the internal functions an API at some point - they're quite powerful :3

This is actually compatible with just about any game to my knowledge (as long as it doesn't have background music shrugshrug), but it's most enjoyed in Exile I imagine pfft. So I don't think I'll mention any other game as compatible just  for that reason
name: exile_songs
short_description: CC0 music tracks that play while you're playing Exile. Permits and will play any ogg vorbis sounds you put in the sounds folder!
title: Exile Ambient Music
